person.persName: Solomon C. Perrin (Covington minister and attorney, Kenton Co Court clerk)

body.p: Covington minister and attorney, and Kenton County Court Clerk. Harrison County native. Married Mary J. Perrin. Father of William Josephus Perrin, Charles Perrin, and Franklin Perrin. Held two slaves in 1860. Former Harrison County legislator and Kenton County Court Judge. Kenton County Court Clerk from 1859 to 1862.
